test_case = int(raw_input())
for t in range(test_case):
    size = int(raw_input())
    array = map(int, raw_input().split())
    array.sort()
    for i in range(1, size):
        if i % 2 == 0:
            array[i], array[i-1] = array[i-1], array[i]
    for a in array:
        print a,
    print
